title: Direct Donation for Education
description: Current donation services lack efficiency, transparency and security. ADA microlending may be difficult due to legal barriers and trust.
solution: Scholarship/donation platform based on Ethiopia's Atala Prism, building trust in ADA amongst both donors and recipients/future microlenders.
experience: Graduate student in economics (University of Oxford). Developers: Comp sci master and master student, both to join the next Plutus pioneer.
